title: Typeface used by Non Format
content:
Hi folks,

Non Format have been using a nice typeface lately but not sure what it is. I thought it was Brown by Lineto by it isn't. Any help appreciated.  
More here: [http://www.thisiscollate.com/blog/2013/5/23/non-format-machine-dreams](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809134533/http:/www.thisiscollate.com/blog/2013/5/23/non-format-machine-dreams "http://www.thisiscollate.com/blog/2013/5/23/non-format-machine-dreams")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809134533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/intro_title_6683.png)
author: Public Spaces Design

comments.content:
I guess one man's nice is another man's goddam dog's breakfast.

hhp
And it's only $229 USD + $10 for "shipping and handling."
